summary: This is an intro video mod that combines a muted 2x speed Skyrim Bethesda logo and the Skyrim Live Action Commercial.
descriptionHtml:
This is an intro video mod that combines a muted 2x speed Skyrim Bethesda logo and the Skyrim Live Action Commercial. It\'s around a minute long and you CAN\'T skip it, so if you wanna just go right into the game this mod is NOT for you. If someone can tell me if there\'s a way to skip it please don\'t hesitate to tell me.

[b]The video is now the actual mod. Please watch to preview it.[/b]

==Installation==

I hardly doubt you need a tutorial if you\'ve been using mods for Skyrim before, but just in case, just drag the \"Video\" folder into \"Data\" (if on XP or below), or just drag the whole \"Data\" folder into the root of Skyrim\'s directory and merge its contents (Vista and above).

[b]~=~=~=BACK UP YOUR ORIGINAL .BIK FILE IN VIDEO!!!=~=~=~[/b]

v2: Fixed the ending and added an Overlay (the video will no longer cut out, had to download WMM6 and set it up for Windows 7, Windows Live Movie Maker SUCKS).
author: jamesadalpiaz
